title: Schema for DENO_PERMISSION_BROKER_PATH
description: The schema of a single line of the DENO_PERMISSION_BROKER_PATH request.

v.description: The version of the schema this value is for.

id.description: The numeric ID of the request. The response must have a matching ID.

datetime.description: The datetime the permission was accessed.

permission.description: The permission that is being checked.

value.description: The value of the permission that was accessed.
